Postgraduate Briefing Session 20242025-2 \[UPDATED\]
----------------------------------------------------

Assalamualaikum and Good Day,

Welcome, all new postgraduate students!  
We cordially invite you to join the postgraduate briefing as follows.

[![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/NEW-STUDENTS-BRIEFING-POSTER-2425-2.png)](https://utm.webex.com/utm/j.php?MTID=mdee4c0fa506f744d8a1be63c6d8dbab1)

Meeting links: [HERE](https://utm.webex.com/utm/j.php?MTID=mdee4c0fa506f744d8a1be63c6d8dbab1)
.  
**Attendance is compulsory for new students.**  
\[NEW\] Notes for this briefing can be downloaded [HERE](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/New-Student-Briefing-Taklimat-Pelajar-Baru-2024-2025-2-New.pdf)
.

Thank you.

**Final Exam Feedback Form (SKE) \[Deadline: 5 June 2022 2359 hrs (MYT)\]**
---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Dear students,

This form is to gather feedback from students who are having difficulties in attending the final exam. You may return your feedback explaining your issue(s) using this form. Please submit this form only once. The School will carefully consider your response before deciding on the final exam mode most suitable for you.

The final examination will be conducted physically. However, based on circumstances, an online examination can be given by the School on a case-by-case basis.

The last date to return this feedback is 5 June 2022 2359 hrs (MYT).

**[CLICK HERE TO WRITE YOUR FEEDBACK](https://forms.gle/wrJtCBJjzSqgMYzE8)
**

Thank you.

**TEACHING AND LEARNING FEEDBACK FORM (SKE)**
---------------------------------------------

**[CLICK TO FILL OUT THE FEEDBACK FORM](https://forms.gle/59cekahDbsw9Pwjf6)
**

The School of Electrical Engineering will conduct its Teaching and Learning in physical mode immediately after the mid-semester break. This decision has been made public on the 6th of April 2022 and you may refer to it _**[HERE.](https://fke.utm.my/blog/2022/04/06/teaching-and-learning-tl-modes-for-semester-2021-2022-2/)**_ This form is to gather feedback from students who are having difficulties/delays in attending physical classes. You may return your feedback explaining your issue(s) using this form. Please submit this form only once. The School will carefully consider your response before deciding on the TnL mode most suitable for you. The final examination will be done physically for all students. The last date to return this feedback is 23 April 2022 23:59 hrs (MYT).

Thank you.

### **Important Notice: Teaching & Learning (T&L) Modes For Semester 20212022-2**

Assalamualaikum and Good day to all,

The School of Electrical Engineering, Faculty of Engineering, Universiti Teknologi Malaysia (SKE, UTM) has decided to enforce the following modes of teaching and learning (T&L) starting from 20 March 2022 for the 2021/2022-2 semester.

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Memo-T-L-SKE-UTM-2021-22-2-14-March-2022_front.jpg)

Please read the full notice [**HERE**](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/Memo-T-L-SKE-UTM-2021-22-2-14-March-2022.pdf "T&L modes 20212022-2")
.

### **Master Project Title Selection 20202021-1**

**![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/title202020211.png)**

For those who have registered or will register **MKE\* 1814 (Project 1)** **f****or the 20202021-1 semester**, you are required to signup at **Postgraduate Online System (POS)** in order to eligible for Master Project 1 Title selection. The POS can be accessed by visiting the following link: [Postgraduate Online System](https://ee.utm.my/posver2.2/)

Once your account has been verified by the administrator; you are required to choose and submit the project title selection, RPP1-1 that will open from **10 October 2020 – 18 October 2020**. Bear in mind, the selection of the master project title is based on first-come first-served basis.

Meanwhile, please take note the action should be taken during the MKE\* 1814 project can be found in the following link: [Project Research Schedule](https://fke.utm.my/postgraduate-current-student/project-research-schedules/)

Regularly check [FKE Postgraduate](https://fke.utm.my/postgraduate-current-student/)
 website for updates.

P/S: please disseminate to others as well.  
Thank you.

**Postgraduate Briefing Session 20192020-2**

Assalamualaikum and Good Day,

Welcome all new postgraduate students!  
We cordially invite you to join the postgraduate briefing as follows.

#### Program: Postgraduate Briefing Session 2019/2020 Sem.2  
Facilitator: Dr. Usman Ullah Sheikh Izzat Ullah Sheikh  
Date: 4 February 2020 (Tuesday)  
Time: 10.00am  
Venue: Level 4, Tutorial Room 5, Block P19A,  
School of Electrical Engineering,  
UTM Johor Bahru

Attendance: Compulsory for new postgraduate fulltime students

**Guidelines**

[Application to Create Account for Postgraduate Online System](http://www.fke.utm.my/postgraduate-current-student/how-to-create-account-for-postgraduate-online-system-pos/)
  
[Application for Student Status Letter](http://www.fke.utm.my/postgraduate-current-student/application-for-student-status-letter/)
